page.title: 17Besom Broom Making.
page.content: Mr Nash has been making{Besom Brooms for 30 years ,and he was 14 when he started.Broomaking has been in his family for{300 Years. { }A Besom is a broom made out of wood.He gets a{hazel}stick and cuts it to size.Then he makes a point on the end with an axe.After that he strips the bark off with a{spoke shave}and smooths it with a{smooth shave.}That is the handle made. To make the brush part he gets a handful of{birch twigs}and bends them in half.That is the middle of the broom,called the dolly. Then he wraps some more twigs around it.After that he ties wire around it and trims the edge with an axe.Then he puts a nail in to hold it together. Mr.Nash is famous for besom brooms because{Wembley Stadium,London Zoo}and {Buckingham Palace}purchase them.
